Row.Text: Receive additional [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity when advancing through the civics and technology trees. Receive aspects of the civilization abilities Dharma, Dynastic Cycles, Great Nusantara, Meiji Restoration and Workshop of the World. Outgoing [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Gold] for each water tile in the city, grant +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +2 [ICON_Science] for each plantation at the destination and grant +2 [ICON_Production] Production, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +2 [ICON_Science] for each improved strategic resource at the destination. Trade routes sent to Singapore from other civilizations provide +6 [ICON_Gold], +1 [ICON_Culture] and +1 [ICON_Science] for the sender and +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold, +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +3 [ICON_Science] to Singapore. Cannot found new cities or hold on to captured cities.

Gain an extra Economic policy slot in any government. Time for governors to establish in cities is reduced. Singapore receives +50% [ICON_Production] Production towards city projects and +100% [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor from each city-state Singapore is a Suzerain of. Gain one influence point per turn towards earning [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys

The HDB Estate replaces the Neighbourhood and provides 10 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing regardless of Appeal, +3 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenities, +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_FODD] Food. Only Singapore may build it.
